resources.title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
resources.description: Learn the fundamentals of prompt engineering and why it matters for AI applications
resources.content: Prompt engineering is the practice of designing and optimizing text prompts to get better results from AI models. It's a crucial skill for anyone working with AI.

resources.title: 15 Essential Prompt Patterns
resources.description: Master the 15 proven patterns that transform basic prompts into powerful AI instructions

resources.title: KERNEL Framework for Enterprise Prompts
resources.description: Learn the 6 principles that achieve 94% success rate and 58% token reduction

resources.title: Chain-of-Thought Prompting
resources.description: Break down complex reasoning into explicit steps for better AI responses
resources.content: Chain-of-Thought prompting helps AI models reason step-by-step. Instead of asking for a direct answer, you guide the model through the reasoning process.

resources.title: Few-Shot Learning with Examples
resources.description: Provide examples to guide AI responses and ensure consistent formatting
resources.content: Few-shot learning involves providing 2-5 examples of the desired output format before asking the AI to perform a task.

resources.title: Persona Pattern: Role-Based Prompting
resources.description: Instruct AI to adopt specific expert personas for better domain knowledge
resources.content: The Persona pattern uses 'Act as...' to give the AI a specific role, expertise level, and perspective.

resources.title: RAG: Retrieval Augmented Generation
resources.description: Combine external knowledge retrieval with AI generation for accurate, sourced responses
resources.content: RAG retrieves relevant information from a knowledge base before generating responses, reducing hallucinations and improving accuracy.

resources.title: Optimizing Prompts for Production
resources.description: Best practices for testing, iterating, and deploying prompts in production systems

resources.title: Template-Based Prompting
resources.description: Use structured templates to ensure consistent, predictable AI outputs
resources.content: Templates provide a structured format for AI to fill in, ensuring consistent output structure across multiple requests.

resources.title: Critique & Improve Pattern
resources.description: Have AI critique and refine its own outputs for higher quality results
resources.content: This iterative pattern asks AI to first generate a response, then critique it, and finally provide an improved version.

resources.title: Prompt Engineering Guide (promptingguide.ai)
resources.description: Comprehensive guide covering latest papers, techniques, and best practices

resources.title: Learn Prompting - Complete Course
resources.description: Free course from basics to advanced prompt engineering techniques

resources.title: Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Guide
resources.description: Official guide from Anthropic covering Claude-specific techniques

resources.title: ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers
resources.description: Free course by Andrew Ng and OpenAI on practical prompt engineering
resources.author: Andrew Ng & Isa Fulford

newResources.title: Vanderbilt University Prompt Engineering Course
newResources.description: Comprehensive video course covering beginner to advanced prompt engineering

newResources.title: Prompt Engineering 101 for Developers
newResources.description: Technical introduction to prompt engineering for software developers

newResources.title: Effective Prompts for AI: The Essentials
newResources.description: MIT Sloan guide on crafting effective AI prompts with practical examples

newResources.title: OpenAI API Best Practices
newResources.description: Official best practices for prompt engineering with OpenAI API

newResources.title: Research Papers Collection
newResources.description: Curated collection of latest research papers on prompt engineering

newResources.title: Advanced Prompting Techniques
newResources.description: Comprehensive guide to advanced techniques like CoT, ReAct, and more

newResources.title: ChatGPT Prompt Engineering (Free Course)
newResources.description: Free comprehensive course with practical live examples

newResources.title: Prompt Engineering for Developers
newResources.description: Build real-world applications with prompt engineering

newResources.title: Free ChatGPT Prompt Engineering with Certificate
newResources.description: Learn advanced techniques with free certificate

newResources.title: Advanced Prompting for Enterprises
newResources.description: Comprehensive guide for enterprise prompt engineering

newResources.title: Prompt Engineering in 2025: Latest Best Practices
newResources.description: Up-to-date guide on current best practices and patterns

newResources.title: Prompt Engineering Tips, Tricks, and Tools
newResources.description: Practical tips and tools for effective prompt engineering

newResources.title: Zero-Shot Prompting Techniques
newResources.description: Master prompting without examples
newResources.content: Zero-shot prompting involves giving the AI a task without any examples, relying on the model's pre-trained knowledge.

newResources.title: Multi-Modal Prompting (Text + Images)
newResources.description: Learn to work with vision-language models
newResources.content: Multi-modal prompting combines text and images to create richer, more contextual AI interactions.

newResources.title: Prompt Injection & Security
newResources.description: Understand and prevent prompt injection attacks
newResources.content: Learn how to protect your AI systems from prompt injection and jailbreaking attempts.

newResources.title: Prompt Chaining for Complex Tasks
newResources.description: Break down complex tasks into sequential prompts
newResources.content: Prompt chaining connects multiple prompts where the output of one becomes the input of the next.

newResources.title: ReAct: Reasoning + Acting
newResources.description: Combine reasoning and action in prompts
newResources.content: ReAct prompting interleaves reasoning traces with task-specific actions for better problem-solving.

newResources.title: Tree of Thoughts (ToT) Prompting
newResources.description: Explore multiple reasoning paths simultaneously
newResources.content: ToT allows the model to explore multiple reasoning paths and self-evaluate to make better decisions.

newResources.title: Prompt Compression Techniques
newResources.description: Reduce token usage while maintaining quality
newResources.content: Learn techniques to compress prompts and reduce costs without sacrificing output quality.

newResources.title: Advanced Role-Based Prompting
newResources.description: Master complex persona and role assignments
newResources.content: Go beyond basic 'Act as' to create nuanced, multi-faceted AI personas.

newResources.title: Systematic Prompt Testing
newResources.description: Test and validate prompts systematically
newResources.content: Learn to create test suites for prompts and measure their effectiveness.

newResources.title: Prompt Versioning & Management
newResources.description: Manage prompt versions in production systems
newResources.content: Best practices for versioning, tracking, and managing prompts in production.

newResources.title: Context Window Optimization
newResources.description: Maximize effectiveness within token limits
newResources.content: Strategies for working effectively within context window constraints.

newResources.title: Debugging Prompts: A Systematic Approach
newResources.description: Troubleshoot and fix problematic prompts
newResources.content: Step-by-step guide to identifying and fixing prompt issues.

newResources.title: Industry-Specific Prompt Engineering
newResources.description: Tailored approaches for different industries
newResources.content: Learn how to adapt prompts for healthcare, finance, legal, and other industries.

newResources.title: OpenAI Strategy Mapping: How Our 15 Patterns Align
newResources.description: Comprehensive mapping showing how Engify.ai patterns cover all OpenAI strategies plus more
newResources.content: Detailed analysis showing how our 15 patterns map to OpenAI's 6 official strategies, demonstrating comprehensive coverage and additional value.
